website_summaries.verdict: These ear warmers slip across the back of your head so you won't flatten the hair on top of your head.
pros: Easily fit in a coat pocket
Wrap style goes around back of head
Stretchable from 35mm to 42mm without undue exertion
Water-resistant seam sealed to keep moisture and wind out
cons: Do not fit larger heads well

website_summaries.verdict: A thicker pair of earmuffs with an easy-to-adjust band.
pros: These earmuffs are very warm and soft, and can fit a range of head sizes
cons: These run a bit small, and some customers found them uncomfortable

customer_reviews.title: Warm and stays on my head
customer_reviews.text: I am a person that uses ear muffs all year around as I don't like wind in my ears with my short hair. I noticed my last pair was always slipping off my ears and have been told by friends it was possibly the brand I used to buy. When I got this pair it seemed kind of large, but after trying them for a couple of days, I realized it was from the fur inside the ear muff that made it seem larger. I am very happy with these ear muffs and I have a small head. I will be buying more of these!
customer_reviews.author: snowball

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely and covers my ears well. It’s not too tight on my head or ears and keeps me warm in very cold weather even with windchill. The fur does tickle a bit sometimes but it doesn’t bother me.
customer_reviews.author: G. NunezTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: fuzzier than usual
customer_reviews.text: I've bought a few different brands and colors of this type of earmuff, and these are a bit fuzzier (on the inside part that touches your ear) than the others that I have seen in the past. I'm not sure if the extra fuzziness makes them warmer or more sound-blocking, but they fit my friend and me just fine and were much appreciated in the cold Chicago winter
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: I wear these instead of a beanie to avoid messing up my hair that I have to wear in a bun for work. They block out the wind and keep my ears warm, while fitting perfectly on my head without being too tight. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Halo Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Nice ear warmers
customer_reviews.text: These look really nice and warm. Not a product where you can wear like a hairband. It has to be worn behind your head and fits snugly covering your ears completely. I have specs so was worried that the ear warmers might make them crooked or I have to adjust it often to keep them straight. But nothing of that sort happened, so I am pretty happy. Just need to test it in the winters and will update my reviews again.
customer_reviews.author: smiley

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: Very little padding where they meet the ear, can feel the metal? frame where if contacts head/ear. Virtually no padding over the frame anywhere except on the outside, where it does no good. Wouldn't recommend unless you like feeling as if there is metal cutting into your ears and head.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They fit well, are warm, and are a bargain!
customer_reviews.text: Very plush (fuzzier on the inside than I gathered from the amazon.com posting) and seemingly well-made.They fit me (a 6'3" male with a normal-sized head) perfectly. They look just like the photos; I was pleasantly surprised when I opened the package. I've only worn them twice because it's been freakishly warm in Chicago for the last several weeks, but I can report that I was able to wear my earbuds underneath with no problems or pain. These ear warmers are a little bulky, but still fold enough to fit into my coat pocket (though there's no room for anything else besides the warmers. So far, these seem to be a great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Bradford LeHew

customer_reviews.title: They're so soft and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! With the winter winds being so bitterly cold the hoods on my jackets weren't enough anymore (especially when they get blown down) My husband has a pair and always wears them so I figured I'd give these a try myself. They expand and contract so it's always a perfect fit, they never fall off and they're not too tight around my head either. My ears are entirely covered and they're easy to fold to fit in my purse. Overall, great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Paola M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fit for Smaller Cranium.
customer_reviews.text: These pinched me a little bit, but that was more about my Rx glasses than anything else; I have to wear those or not get anything done/cannot see. Other than that, I absolutely love these. They are smaller and fit my head really well. I may not return them after all; found out I am getting lynx earmuffs for Yule, so these aren't necessary...I said I'd return them, but I might change my mind after all. I really do love them. In case the fancy ones do not fit, I might want to keep these after all. I highly recommend for smaller heads.
customer_reviews.author: Rhayzza

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These keep my ears nice and warm in the cold months! They are adjustable, and are pretty easy to adjust. they fit well and allow me to wear my hair in a pony. Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: T-A-L

customer_reviews.title: Cold Ears
customer_reviews.text: If you have a small head or your occipital bone isn't pronounced enough, these WILL fall down. Earmuffs that can't stay on my head can't keep my ears warm. Low quality but expected for the price. The poor quality makes these a temporary solution for cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Dufresne

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't really tested them out yet as it isn't cold enough, but I'm not a fan that they don't fit like normal earmuffs and have to be worn at the back of the head. I really thought I read that they were adjustable also. They really are not comfortable at all, I can barely move my head around without them falling off or feeling like they are going to fall off.
customer_reviews.author: DoriGR

customer_reviews.title: Here's the OBVIOUS problem...
customer_reviews.text: When you look at the picture(s) It shows utilizing it in place around the neck base to ears OR over the head to ears. -But the latter DOES NOT WORK AT ALL, it only fits around the neck base and one must stretch it at that TO fit. I'm a woman with an average head (no cracks please) and this item should fit as describe and it does not. Might fit a kid though...Poor advertising if not inaccurate.
customer_reviews.author: Peggie Davis, Las Vegas, NV.

customer_reviews.title: SCAMMERS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Please beware before you purchace from this company!! I recieved ear muffs that did NOT even reach my ears!!! I am a small woman and I am doubtfull that they would fit a toddler!!! I contacted the company and Amazon has also however there has been NO RESPONSE FROM THEM!!! I feel they are selling defective goods and getting away with it!! It makes me question the safety of shopping online!! I will be filling a complaint wit Amazon about this company and if need be the BBB!! I thought I had secure buying but,that does not seem to be the case!!! If my review is unpostable then I shall review on another site!!
customer_reviews.author: Ritta

customer_reviews.title: These are warm, comfortable, and don't crush my hair.
customer_reviews.text: I knew what I was getting because I had bought 2 pair some time ago. I had bought the brown and black ones. I liked them a lot. Then my grandson permanently "borrowed" the black ones. I still loved the brown ones but they didn't look great with my new coat. I recently ordered the navy and grey ones. These ear warmers wrap around the lower back of the head and stay securely in place when worn. They are so comfortable that I often forget that I have them on.
customer_reviews.author: jeloise

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The frame inside these earmuffs is plastic, so you cant bend it to better fit your head and the plastic frame is oddly square. I can feel them sliding down the back of my head when I put them on. The muffs themselves have weird plastic circles with a tall edge that you can feel through the fabric. Not great ear muffs, I'd be better off wearing an oversized scarf to cover my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: It broke.
customer_reviews.text: It broke as soon as we got it, just trying to put it on. Not good. But best customer service for taking the return.
customer_reviews.author: Tina O

customer_reviews.title: So warm
customer_reviews.text: I've bought about 4 of these over the past couple of years. They're super warm and I usually put it around my arm when I need to take if off (on the train or in a store). The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because if can get kind of uncomfortable on the ears/head after a while. It also doesn't fold up as flat as an old one I used to have. That would make it easier to put in my coat closet and harder to lose.
customer_reviews.author: Tzivi Kleinbart

customer_reviews.title: Great earmuffs that don’t squash your curls
customer_reviews.text: These earmuffs fit on the back of your head . I have a large head and they fit me. I wore them for the first time today and liked them. They were warm and comfortable. I had a stand up collar on and they still worked fine. I have naturally curly hair that does not survive a hat so they worked well for me. My hair still looked good when I removed them.
customer_reviews.author: Adamson

customer_reviews.title: Very warm!
customer_reviews.text: Very warm and fuzzy. I bought them to replace a different set for when I go running, and they are almost too warm sometimes! Very soft, fur lined on the ears
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Ear warmers
customer_reviews.text: If you have a larger head you probably wont like these. My helmet size is 23". The fact that these fold actually make them uncomfortable. I have some inexpensive ones that dont fold . They dont feel like they are going to pop off back of my head. For a girl or smaller person they would probably be fine and would keep your ears warm.
customer_reviews.author: jerry

customer_reviews.title: Ears are so much warmer now
customer_reviews.text: The muffs are great at keeping your ears nice and warm. My only complaint is if you wear them for long period of times, they can give you a headache because they are snug!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place
customer_reviews.text: Great for jogging in cold weather. Can wear head phones under them. They stay on and keep ways warm with minimal readjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Phaedra Henn

customer_reviews.title: Really great but not for long periods
customer_reviews.text: Really soft and very warm. Easy to store and use. The fit sometimes feels a bit loose but they've never fallen off. I like to use them on windy hikes or windy beaches, when its too warm to wear a hat but you dont want the wind in your ears. The only drawback for me is after wearing them a while, they start to hurt my ears. Although so do over the ear headphones so maybe it's just me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ear warmers!
customer_reviews.text: These ear warmers live up to their name! My ears are toasty warm, they fit perfectly and don’t pinch. I wear glasses and have no problem. I love that they are cushiony again my ears and you can hear perfectly. Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Not for people with HUGE HEADS.
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a very large head and these barely cover his ears. When he turns his head, one of his ears is exposed. If you have a normal size head you should be fine, but if you wear an XL hat size, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: NebraskaBurger

customer_reviews.title: Missing potential
customer_reviews.text: Not quite a one size fits all solution. It cups around your ears but slides off ever so slightly as you go about your day. If they thought to put in slits or soft plastic hooks to hang off your ears simulating what sunglasses do, this might become a winner.
customer_reviews.author: OldCat

customer_reviews.title: These only fit adults if you put them behind your head and not on top.
customer_reviews.text: These earmuffs are not adjustable. If you are an adult and try putting them on top of your head, they will stop ABOVE your ears. But if you put them behind your neck they can cover your ears as long as you don't have "puffy" hair ;)
customer_reviews.author: Barb in NY

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item to take on a trip so have not actually used yet. The fit is snug but not too tight and am able to adjust size. They feel as if my ears will stay warm. It is easy to "fold" ear muffs and the size will fit in a purse or a small corner of suitcase. The price was quite reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Lazy one

customer_reviews.title: Soft but too thin-- The wire hurts
customer_reviews.text: They're very soft, but the wire in the inside is so stiff against your head. It only takes a little while to give a headache. This will work for now, but only until I'm willing to splurge on something with a bit more fluff and cushion.
customer_reviews.author: JJ The Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice & warm!
customer_reviews.text: The ear covering part is larger than previous ones and nice & warm! The part that goes behind your head keeps your neck warm. Hat pushes them down a bit - the only down side.
customer_reviews.author: Jan K. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Too hot. Didn’t fit right. Broke in two weeks.
customer_reviews.text: They’re warm that’s for sure. Perhaps a little too warm. The part that covers your ears that’s like a faux fur gets very hot, and you don’t even realize how wet your ear is getting even though it’s freezing out (gross I know). The problem is my pair broke after 2 weeks of light use. I kept it in my coat pocket, nothing crazy. The inside part that keeps the shape simply snapped in half. You could get a much nicer pair somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Compared to 180s, these are more comfortable, larger, not extendable, and less foldable. They are still pretty large when folded. Can't fit them in your pants pocket, but a jacket/coat pocket would be fine.
customer_reviews.author: just bein' Frank

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price!
customer_reviews.text: They're a little bulkier than the lost pair of 180's earmuffs that they're replacing. But the quality , comfort, and price make them a very good buy. I ride a bike year round, so ear warmth is crucial and these do the job very well
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of muffs and they work very well, even with a cap on. Being foldable you can put these in your coat pocket until needed. They are a little bulky when folded in your pocket. They are soft, warm and comfortable. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: mad mike

customer_reviews.title: Muffles hearing, but warm
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my ears toasty warm. Tho it is harder to hear when they are on!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customertobe

customer_reviews.title: but they stay on well and they are nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about these, but they stay on well and they are nice and warm. More comfortable than the ones that go over your head too. Besides that, they go with my coat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice & warm but a little short, Took 6 (six) days to ship.
customer_reviews.text: The ear muffs are nice. They are not long enough to rest on the top of my head. They are very warm on my ears & hold my earphones in place. They don't stay on well at all if you try to put a hat over them. I would really love them if they were an inch or so longer. They took 6-(SIX) days with amazon Prime. I am loosing confidence that amazon can get anything to me in a timely fashion. Why do I pay for 2 day shipping then get the item in 6 days??
customer_reviews.author: reliable consumer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Snug fit- hard to adjust. Either thin material or Internal plastic piece are super large. Easily felt from outside of material. Get what you pay for- buy the more expensive. Not saving money with these
customer_reviews.author: Nana Meriwether

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: These earmuffs do the job well and are very soft! They do seem a little cheap with the internal folding mechanism but other than that, they keep my ears warm
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: very comfy
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old ear warmer with this one. so far, i love it. The pad on either side is more than enough to keep the ears warm and completely covered. but the plastic mechanism inside (to strech and collapse) could have been better (I feel it is not firm to stick to one position).
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Helped fiance survive NY cold winters!
customer_reviews.text: Fiance refused to wear earmuffs. I bought these, made him wear them, now he won't take them off. Makes a huge difference, especially in freezing areas. Very warm. They don't look "girly" for men who are looking at purchasing this. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amrita K

customer_reviews.title: Awkward fit.
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable. Awkward fit. Folds up and unfolds like its broken. However, the material is fine, and it is warm. I needed these for work, when it is necessary to go out into the cold for short periods of time. Totally unlike the first pair I bought that fit well. Whoever stole them is enjoying a great pair of ear muffs!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Waters

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but bulky
customer_reviews.text: I have used Degrees for years. When I lost them, I thought of trying a different one. These are quite warm, and good quality. The only thing I didn’t like about them was that they are too bulky. If you are used to keeping your earmuffs in your jacket pockets, you won’t like the style.
customer_reviews.author: Chhavi A.

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: Super soft, keeps my ears warm. I bought them for a trip to iceland, and they worked well. Good material and filling that kept my ears warm. Color was exact as shown on order image. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hester

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable warm earmuffs
customer_reviews.text: I'm a female with an average size head and these fit great. They are adjustable and could fit a larger head. I've had some ear muffs squeeze and end up making my ears ache. These don't do that. I haven't worn them for extended periods of time though. They are soft and I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Super Warm
customer_reviews.text: These don't slip at all! It's hard to see in the picture but it is curved on the ear part so that it wraps around your ear, it doesn't just lie flat against them. It's well insulated and doesn't slip under or on top of my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Nich

customer_reviews.title: Broke as we tried them
customer_reviews.text: The day we received the Ear Warmers, my 13 y.o. son pulled the 2 sides to put them on his head -he was careful because we knew ear warmers break easily- and they broke...
customer_reviews.author: M. F.

customer_reviews.title: Prefer these over others as they fold up nicely.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair (different colors) of these that I've purchased. They're warm and attractive and I love that they easily fold and I have put them in my pocket when I'm not wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: jtay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lenght
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. I have a big head and was worried that it may not be big enough for me. However, I was happy to see that it lengthens just fine. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: F.Chidi

customer_reviews.title: Great for Men or Women
customer_reviews.text: I do not like wearing a hat, so these work very well to keep my ears and head warm. I have a friend who is a mail carrier and he wears these, too, so they are definitely unisex.
customer_reviews.author: SJP

customer_reviews.title: Slips down a little while walking
customer_reviews.text: It covers the entire ear but does slip down during walking or looking up several times.
customer_reviews.author: Elesh L.

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed how tight these ear warmers are and have they have very little extra pull to lossen them on my head. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: New York

customer_reviews.title: High quality and visually appealing.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality earmuffs. I've been using them for the cold of Minnesota with no complaints. My ears stay warms, the muffs can be folded repeatedly to fit in my pockets, and the visual appeal of the gray and black (including the seams) is great. I have not tried/considered how to clean/wash these yet.
customer_reviews.author: F Hussain

customer_reviews.title: Not a Fan
customer_reviews.text: The 1st time you wear them the fit is just right, around your 3rd time they stretch out and too big and you can't adjust them. Definitely not a fan, I would've sent them back but I just don't have the time but definitely not happy with the fit at all.
customer_reviews.author: Chaun

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: The earmuff covers my ears and keeps the cold wind out without hugging my head to tightly. My prior 180 earmuffs were uncomfortably tight even though I have a small head. I prefer the fit of the Metog.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Colo

customer_reviews.title: No gift box
customer_reviews.text: The ear warmers are fine, but they came ina bag without tags. I was giving them as a gift and it unfortunately looked like I was regifting used earmuffs. The product is perfectly fine though.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: We got these for outlr autistic son to slightly dampen sou d when hes overstimulated. He gets overwhelmed by the too tight noise cancelling headphones. These are nice and soft and just enough for his needs.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Bobila

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad features
customer_reviews.text: The muffs are plush, warm, and inexpensive but they are uncomfortable on the ear. Perhaps they don't adjust to be long enough or the frame is simply too tight. Time to try different brand.
customer_reviews.author: newportgirl

customer_reviews.title: small; falls off easily
customer_reviews.text: I have a medium-sized head (according to hats.com) and these earmuffs just barely fit. They fall off easily (such as when putting on/taking off my jacket). And it seems like there is a definite "correct" up/down orientation in that one feels more secure than the other, but it's always a guess on my part. I can't tell which way is up from looking at them.
customer_reviews.author: Janus

customer_reviews.title: Fits Small Heads
customer_reviews.text: The muff doesn't ride as well on my normal-sized head as others I've used in the past. I think there's too much padding and faux fur. Might be ideal for individuals with smaller heads.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Smedra

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: It does not fit me well but it could be because of my big head and hair. It slides off my ears easily. I got one for hubby and it seems to fit his little bald head just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: I like the ear muffs so far
customer_reviews.text: I like the ear muffs. I wish the inside was more puffy, but they are fur lined. So far the frame hasn't hurt my ears.
customer_reviews.author: iteachmom

customer_reviews.title: HUGE
customer_reviews.text: These ear warmers are huge. I made the mistake of buying multiple colors too. They are also not fold-able. Be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Not for people with glasses
customer_reviews.text: I wear glasses and these muffs squeeze my ear pieces into my head and it hurts. I also have issues with them falling down off my ears sometimes. Otherwise, I like how I can put them under my long hair so they don't mat down my hair. They are adjustable, and I must have a small head because I have to adjust them as small as they'll go, but they do fit. And they're nicely warm.
customer_reviews.author: tra18232

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I hate wearing hats and I think they look so dumb on me. These ear muffs kept my ears so warm while cross country skiing and I forgot they were on my head. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren R

customer_reviews.title: And super plus, I received right on time
customer_reviews.text: Omg, these hug my ears and around my head perfectly, they feel so warm, and the color of the ear warmers match my coat perfectly. Can't wait to actually test them out tomorrow when I head out for work. And super plus, I received right on time. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: WMontefusco

customer_reviews.title: Supper soft with a great fit
customer_reviews.text: They are really soft and fit snug to my head so they don’t slid down. I really like them to because unlike typical ear muffs, a hat or other products this doesn’t mess my hair up!
customer_reviews.author: Tinam822

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: If you have short hair like me, you can really appreciate having something that does not have to go on top of my head . They really help when it's cold outside and coat weather.
customer_reviews.author: Pam D'Aliesio

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed it, definitely comfortable and really easy to bend. I definitely would buy it if I were looking for earmuffs.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Campos

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your ears warm
customer_reviews.text: I use these every day and so far they seem to work pretty well. Definitely warm and stay on your head. Hoping they don't stretch out in a few months-if that happens I will write another review. For now I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: amy king

customer_reviews.title: I have had ear warmers like these before when we lived in Alaska
customer_reviews.text: I have had ear warmers like these before when we lived in Alaska , loved them then (lost those) love these. they don't mess up my hair and hair clips, they stay on nicely. Can hear just fine with them on. I sometimes forget I have them on!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon G

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME warmers!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these!! I love how they stay snug to my ears and I can wrap them around my neck - they do not have to go over my head and mess up my hair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bulky...
customer_reviews.text: These earmuffs are bulky and do not fold down nicely. They work well to keep my ears warm, I just wish they would fold down to store in my purse or coat pocket when I’m not wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: These ear muffs does the job. They keep my ears warm. It does stay on your head but sometimes if you're moving around a bit, it does slide off. They are slightly adjustable. Could be cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: defaultTop Contributor: Travel Guides & Tips

customer_reviews.title: Great functionality-economy option!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great, inexpensive option for keeping your ears warm. My husband uses them walking to work and they do an excellent job keeping out the cold and are really comfortable. The only thing to be aware of is that they are not very compact when they fold-up. But if you're just worried about keeping your ears warm, these are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sarahbeth Ward

customer_reviews.title: The previous one I had was thinner and fit my head much better. These are too thick
customer_reviews.text: Had to return these. The previous one I had was thinner and fit my head much better. These are too thick, ride too low on the back of my head, and want to start coming off when I turn my head. Also, because of the thickness, they catch my coat collar and start to also pull off my ear.
customer_reviews.author: MAB

customer_reviews.title: Lend me your ears.......
customer_reviews.text: Very warm, toasty, and comfortable to wear. Nice simple design will go nicely with any outerwear.
customer_reviews.author: DeeBee

customer_reviews.title: Too large for my small adult head and small ears.
customer_reviews.text: These were to long for my small ears and the circumference my ears. Henceforth, I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Kimber Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great for cold weather
customer_reviews.text: I live in FL, but I traveled to Antarctica in March. They worked really well keeping my ears warm and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: was very pleased, as he will use them often when tending ...
customer_reviews.text: The recipient of this earmuff gift, along with his cashmere scarf, was very pleased, as he will use them often when tending to his property in the mountains, or shooting target practice. Well made and a really nice value. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: story teller

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Earmuffs
customer_reviews.text: Great earmuffs. Only con I experienced is they can only be put on one way. No biggie. Stay on comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Fit is small.
customer_reviews.text: As per some of the other reviews, these are a tad small. My head is not huge, but the muffs are not snug and tend to slide off as I move my head. I will be returning them and ordering some 180s.
customer_reviews.author: Philo

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves them
customer_reviews.text: He likes that the fur is on the inside to keep ears warm. He likes how they hug his head.
customer_reviews.author: ginger

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: Very bad fleece. After one month use all the fur tear it down. Also I brought this for 8$ and now its 5$ looks like seller is playing with it for their benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Navas Kurian

customer_reviews.title: Cannot wear on top of head
customer_reviews.text: These would be comfortable and fine if they were long enough to fit on top of head. But you have to wear on back of head as they won't stretch enough, and they can fall off. At least on me they do. This is unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: ck

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price in style, value and functionality.
customer_reviews.text: These turned out to be better than I expected. The fit it good, they are comfortable and I would recommend them to anyone wanting to keep their ears warm.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Decent ear muffs
customer_reviews.text: I do like these and ease-of-use. However one-size-fits-all is not exactly accurate. I have a smaller head then most females and they don't quite shrink down enough to hold properly on my ears but they don't fall off either.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S. Norris

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality, Often Uncomfortable Product
customer_reviews.text: These ear warmers are pretty clearly a low quality fabric which although not great, is not unexpected. However, they had a metal ring in the ear part which dug into my ears consistently. It made it uncomfortable to have on and eventually I just decided its better to be cold than in pain.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Ear warmer
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable & Warm. I like the fact that I can wrap them on my wrist while I’m not wearing them & that they go behind my head on my neck so my hair doesn’t get messed up.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: very warm and much thicker than others i have had
customer_reviews.text: These had a very attractive price and when i got them was very surprised. They are very thick and well made. I would buy them again in a second.
customer_reviews.author: exconsul

customer_reviews.title: foldable ear warmers
customer_reviews.text: They look nice but not sure about how they will fit, they are Christmas Gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Giraffe

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy
customer_reviews.text: They function as expected. They keep my ears very warm on my daily walks with my dog in the 20 degree weather :)
customer_reviews.author: Holly Beth

customer_reviews.title: I LOVED these ear muffs so much
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED these ear muffs so much.....BUT OF COURSE, like everything that's not attached to my body---I LOST them on my vacation to ICELAND...I hope someone that found them is liking them as much as I did..
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Epperson

customer_reviews.title: perfect size and thickness.
customer_reviews.text: these are perfect. i gave them as xmas presents,everybody love them.
customer_reviews.author: anthony resha

customer_reviews.title: Warm and lots of coverage!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these to keep his ears warm. He has relatively large ears and they cover over them, plus keep his neck warm from the wind while he’s overseas.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Creger

customer_reviews.title: but they're fairly nice. They rest at the back of your head
customer_reviews.text: The seem a little small, but they're fairly nice. They rest at the back of your head, which is OK if you don't have long hair. I do and they want to slide a bit. The price was very good and the shipping speedy.
customer_reviews.author: iLUVscifi

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: Fits me (adult female) and my 3 year old son. I love these products and I'm so glad that I found them here! I've been looking for one of these since I lost mine during a move several years ago. Buy several!!
customer_reviews.author: CeeRex30

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product in black but recieved it torn up and in the color brown with black interior. I don’t even see that as a color choice when purchasing. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon addict

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: These are EXCELLENT. You can hear through them and they keep your ears very warm
customer_reviews.author: sean husley

product_meta.title: Metog Unisex Foldable Ear Warmers Polar Fleece/kints Winter EarMuffs
feature_bullets: Gift box earmuffs for Christmas and NEW YEAR:Our foldable earmuffs is great winter accessory!Good choice for every winter outdoor activities!Also,Our GIFT BOX EARMUFFS would be a nice gift for parents,friends,and your lover!

Excellent material warms your winter:Our ear warmer is 100% Acrylic and the binding is Reflective Polyester.Inside fur is Imitation rabbit hair,which is soft and Compliance with natural.The external Frame is 100%Polystyrene.Environmentally friendly materials package meets modern needs!
One Size fits most people:Our unisex foldable earmuffs fits most women and men!The shortest is 35cm and it can be stretched up to 42cm,but attention not to place undue exertion when pull it.

Your good partner in winter:Our winter ear warmer is foldable and adjustable,convenient and lightweight!It’s easy to fold into a smaller size and portable!The ear muffs is seam sealed and keeps Moisture and Wind Out. Our durable earmuffs will accompany you for long time!
AFTER-SELL GUARANTEE: If you are not satisfied with our product,please contact us and we’ll give you a satisfied answer without any additional conditions. All issues will be solved within 24 hours.
